title: How to send a letter to a celebrity that I like, and where should I find them - Quora

response.answer_text: I assume you are talking mainly about entertainment personalities. The best way to send a letter would be to address it to them in care of their studio, record label, publisher, the last movie studio they did a movie for, television headquarters, etc. All those addresses can be found online. Write to their agent if you can find who it is. Neatly hand-write the letter and, honestly, don’t expect a personal reply, but you never know.
